attributes.review: Absolutely horrific app. Completely messed up my aura. Now normally I love Cheetos, but I have to say the racist, homophobic, sexual predator ones (among many other disastrous things) just really put a bad taste in my mouth. I hope this app ceases to exist because it really puts a damper on the spirit of America. MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!!🥰🧚🏽‍♀️✨
attributes.title: Disgusting trashy app

attributes.review: Recently I downloaded this and it immediately downloaded all of my data. Including my nudes that I have of my 4 year old brother. This app also asks for your ethnicity so they will probably bring ice to my house❄️. The only ice I want is the ones where the girls shove it up their 🐈. DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: THIS APP SOLD MY NUDES

attributes.review: I voted for Donald J. Trump in the 2016 election and I got this app this year to support him again and all I can say is that this app has spread nothing but fake news! This app made me hate Trump and you should all NOT download it. Wait, actually do download it so you realize what an ignorant scum this man is. Biden 2020!!
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: This is beyond awful. I downloaded this app and figured out it’s been taking information from my phone to see who I’m supporting and if I saying or looking at anything bad about Donald. If you like privacy, don’t download.
attributes.title: Awful. Just awful

attributes.review:
Ever since I downloaded this app my phones been glitching out. My phone has NEVER done this. The   app wiped out EVERYTHING on my phone and all the information I had on my phone. I contacted help and THEY DID NOTHING!!!! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 😡😡
It stole my information and made my phone glitch. SO UNHAPPY HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE 😤
attributes.title: WOULD NEVER AGAIN! HORRIBLE!!! 😡
